property_description:
MIDDLE UNIT: 4-Bedroom Luxury Terrace in Prime Jahi Location, Abuja

This home is ideal for families, professionals, or investors seeking a modern and well-located property in the heart of Abuja. Whether you're buying for personal use or rental income, the location and features offer unmatched value.

Location: Jahi, Abuja Proximity: 5 mins to Wuse 2, 10 mins to Gwarimpa, Strategically situated just behind Next Cash & Carry, Abuja’s biggest one-stop superstore for furniture, appliances, groceries, and more!

Property Features:
 Type: 4-Bedroom Luxury Terrace, All Rooms En-Suite, Guest Toilet, Fully Fitted Kitchen, 2 Spacious Living Rooms (Main + Family Lounge), Ample Parking Space

Facilities & Utilities: 24/7 Security, 24/7 Water Supply, Constant Power Supply + Solar Backup
